EmailTemplate.description: Artwork Approval predefined template for outbound comms for the the bulk mail onboarding case management team
EmailTemplate.name: Bulk Mail - Artwork Approval Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Australia Post - Customer Onboarding Case: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Customer Onboarding
Reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi,
Your artwork appears to meet the Australia Post specifications.
To ensure that your mail is processed efficiently through our network, in the future, please ensure you refer to our PreSort letters service guide, available at www.auspost.com.au/presortlettersand follow the specifications for the relevant product.
Kind regards,
Customer Onboarding Australia Post
{!Case.Thread_Id}
Nothing in this email is intended to exclude or limit any rights or remedies that you may have under the Australian Consumer Law.
This email was sent by Australia Post. Australia Post does not represent, warrant or guarantee that the integrity of this email communication has been maintained nor that the communication is free of errors, viruses or interference. Terms & conditions | Privacy policy
